text: phtoytowvinh puok anak ban nukasman tha anakneasar( mou ha- meat) ning banda anak del mean chomnue nung min vilotralb mokkan kruo sar robsa puokke vinh cheadeachkhat . haey ke( shai t n) ban loma rueng noh nowknong chetd robsa puok anak haey puok anak ban kit akrak(tha a l laoh min chuoy mou ha meat ning anak del mean chomnue laey) haey puok anakchea krom del vineasa a nd reay
